alternativeNames: de Méllo, Joachim Correia; Méllo, Joachim Correia de; Correia de Méllo, Joachim; Méllo, Joachim Corrêa; Corrêa de Méllo, Joachim
comments: Mss. names published many years after his death, see Arq. Mus. Paraense, 9: 3 (1952), but most are invalid because without latin descriptions.
examples: Pithecoxanium Corr. Mello in Arquiv. Mus. Paran. 9: 53 (1952), without latin descr.
